Texts.Chs: 修理这个工具并不太难，但是我们需要的材料可能很难得到。^green;找来^orange;12部分天人科技^green;和^orange;12块天人金属^reset;，我想就我修好外壳。
Texts.Eng: Repairing this tool isn't too hard, but the materials we need may be difficult to obtain. ^green;Find me ^orange;12 pieces of Centensian Tech^green; and ^orange;12 pieces of Centensian Metal^reset;, and I think I can repair the casing.

Texts.Chs: 干得好，船长。我现在就开始修理工具的外壳。
Texts.Eng: Well done, Captain. I'll get to repairing the tool casing now.
